name: Deadstorm Pirates
overview:
Play as one of the pirates manning a ship. Skeleton pirates and other baddies attack you on your quest to claim "Poseidon's Breath."

The player uses a unique gun which has two triggers, pressing both increases the speed of shot, but runs your ammo down quicker. The arcade cabinet also has a ship's wheel which is used to steer the boat. In these sections the player is given a very short time to turn the ship in the required direction.
